name: STELLORE
description:
DESKTOP ONLY

This is the WebGL Port of STELLORE which was originally a Google Play exclusive!

Navigate through challenging maze-like levels to collect ORE!

Infinite Runner meets Lunar Lander and Asteroid Mining! You have just been hired on to the rag-tag team of asteroid prospectors looking for riches among the stars!

Choose from an array of unique and stylish company vessels and blast off into space in search of riches! (**NOTE: "These ships are COMPANY PROPERTY and any damage or destruction caused will be taken out of your wages, WE ARE NOT INSURED!" - Kommandant Rysling

1. Land on asteroids to mine them!

2. Land on Fuel Stations to refuel!

3. Don't crash your rocket into ANYTHING!

4. ???

5. That's it happy mining!

TWO MODES TO PLAY

PIONEER MODE: Blast off into the stars in search of riches!

ADVENTURE MODE: Navigate through challenging maze-like levels to collect ORE!

Stay tuned and follow @playSTELLORE on Twitter for future updates!
